name: ChaosBall
description:
ChaosBall

Set your goal to survive with ten balls on the screen, and you'll be surprised by how hard it is, proving why chaos theory is correct and is why the game is called ChaosBall!

Notes:
  • I created this game to start having a way to earn money, despise I know the chances were low. I am a young 3rd world student but ambitious, with having a goal to earn enough money to achieve better projects! It feels bad to ask for this but donate if you want to.
  • I am making a retro version of this! It will make feel like it was made at the same time as pong! I'll add the link here when it is complete!
  • The retro version is out!
